text: Secrets of the Hidden Temple is the debut studio album by American hip hop group Blac Monks, which consisted of Houston-based rappers Mr. 3-2, D.A. and Awol. It was released on September 13, 1994 through Rap-A-Lot Records. Production on the album was done by John Bido, Troy Clark and DJ Ready Red. The album peaked at number 65 on the US Billboard Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums chart. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" ! scope="col" |Chart (1994) ! scope="col" |Peak position |- ! scope="row" |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 debut albums Category:Rap-A-Lot Records albums Category:Albums produced by Mike Dean (record producer) Category:Blac Monks albums
title: Secrets of the Hidden Temple
